hero.subtitle: Where luxury meets authentic storytelling
hero.description: Connect with premium travel creators who transform destinations into captivating stories. Elevate your brand with authentic, luxury content.

featuredCreators.title: Featured Creators
featuredCreators.subtitle: Discover our handpicked selection of luxury travel creators who bring destinations to life through authentic storytelling and premium content.
featuredCreators.noCreatorsFound: No creators found. Please try again later.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Connect with creators and brands in just a few simple steps. Our platform makes collaboration seamless and secure.

brand.title: For Brands
brand.subtitle: Find the perfect creator for your campaign and get authentic content from anywhere in the world

step1.title: Discover Creators
step1.description: Browse our curated selection of travel creators and find the perfect match for your brand and destination.

step2.title: Send Offers
step2.description: Choose from pre-made packages or create custom collaboration offers. Chat directly with creators.

step3.title: Secure Payment
step3.description: Pay securely through our platform. Funds are held safely until you receive and approve the content.

step4.title: Receive Content
step4.description: Get high-quality, authentic content delivered directly to your dashboard. Ready to use across all platforms.

creator.title: For Creators
creator.subtitle: Monetize your travels and create amazing content for brands while exploring the world

step1.title: Create Profile
step1.description: Set up your creator profile with your travel style, audience, and content expertise.

step2.title: Add Travel Plans
step2.description: Share your upcoming trips and destinations. Brands will find you based on where you're going.

step3.title: Create Content
step3.description: Collaborate with brands and create authentic content during your travels. Follow the brief and deliver quality work.

step4.title: Get Paid
step4.description: Receive secure payments directly to your account once the brand approves your content. Build your reputation.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of creators and brands already using Lumo to create amazing content worldwide
